about_the_game:
Important:

• If you already have the M-IV-Y, you will receive 3,250 gold in compensation
• If you already have the Stalker Legendary camouflage, you will receive 1,450 gold in compensation.

This bundle includes:

• M-IV-Y Premium tank (U.S.A., heavy, Tier VIII)
• Garage slot
• 9 equipment slots
• Stalker Legendary camouflage
• Robocompanion attachment
• 15 Gold boosters
• 15 Rare Credit boosters
• Sea Monster Legendary animated avatar

The M-IV-Y combines a classic heavy's armor and an unusual gun with a 4-shell magazine. It's the perfect tank for both aggressive fighting and positional combat.

This DLC bundle can only be added to your World of Tanks Blitz account once.
